Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class App

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.gang60.App
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
public class App extends javafx.application.Application implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
Main application class for the Boba POS system. Manages scene navigation and maintains the current employee session.

      public static javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loadFXMLLoader(String fxml) throws IOException

      Parameters:

      Returns:
